example.text: Induction of a mutation in the lacI gene will result in the loss of transcriptional repression of the lacZ gene in mutated cells.
example.arg: Induction of a mutation in the lacI gene
in the loss of transcriptional repression of the lacZ gene

example.text: Mutations which prevent repressor binding to either site or alter the phasing of the binding sites result in simultaneous derepression of both genes.
example.arg: in simultaneous derepression of both genes

example.text: These observations show that repression is the result of co-operative binding of the repressor to its two sites, resulting in the formation of a loop of DNA.
example.arg: of co-operative binding of the repressor

example.text: We show that the negative effect of the cpxA mutation on biofilm formation results from a decreased transcription of the curlin encoding csgA gene.
example.arg: from a decreased transcription of the curlin encoding csgA gene
the negative effect of the cpxA mutation

example.text: We speculated that this may be the result of the expression of isoforms of Nrf1 in mast cells.
example.arg: of the expression of isoforms of Nrf1
